entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WASM build broken on main #81136
  • [API Proposal]: Add ReadCommentHandling to JsonSourceGenerationOptions #81131
  • Extra ILC warnings when PublishAOT=true on property with UnconditionalSuppressMessage #81129
  • SortedList<> Enumerator is allocated on the heap #81128
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.SourceGenerator failed to generate with custom array attribute value on property #81124
  • `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests` native crash on mono/linux/arm64 #81123
  • Test failure Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_22348\\Test22348\\Test22348.cmd #81120
  • ILC error when using a function pointer type nested under a generic type #81117
  • Issue with building and publishing Asp.Net 4 website in docker file #81114
  • [linux-musl-arm] paltest_pal_sxs_test1 failed in outerloop #81113
  • Test failure TypeGeneratorTests1200-1299 #81112
  • Test failure JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\GitHub_18362\\GitHub_18362\\GitHub_18362.cmd #81111
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/xxobj/sizeof/sizeof64_Target_64Bit_and_arm_il_r/sizeof64_Target_64Bit_and_arm.cmd #81109
  • AssemblyLoadContext crash on linux during exception processing #81108
  • Test failure Loader\\classloader\\Casting\\Functionpointer\\Functionpointer.cmd #81106
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\opt\\ObjectStackAllocation\\ObjectStackAllocationTests\\ObjectStackAllocationTests.cmd #81103
    8.0.0
  • Strange behavior when type matching on arrays of enums #81102
  • Expose managed Main with NativeAOT when compiling the application as a static library #81097
    8.0.0
  • Getting MetadataType attributes through MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes(true) #81089
  • [API Proposal]: FrozenDictionary/Set.ToFrozen* overloads that take optimization level #81088
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'System.Text.Ascii:ChangeCase' when JitDumping #81087
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json unable to deserialize an object that implement IEnumerable but is itself not a list #81084
    Future
  • JIT: Improper handling of GC structs with undone promotion in tailcall-to-loop optimization #81081
    8.0.0
  • 'dotnet run' behaves different on SIGTERM with Mono compared to CoreCLR #81093
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #81105
  • Change the default package for the "Used By" section on GitHub #81078
  • Enable building/running libraries tests on iOS simulator and device with NativeAOT #81075
  • `NetworkInformationException DirectoryNotFoundException: Could not find a part of the path '/proc/sys/net/ipv4/conf/lo/forwarding'` with NET 7.0.2 on gVisor #81061

Closed

  • Different class layout for LayoutKind.Explicit in .NET 7 #80973
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/ELEMENT_TYPE_IU/i_array_merge_Target_32BIT_il_d/i_array_merge_Target_32BIT.cmd #81116
  • Test failure Interop\\PInvoke\\SetLastError\\SetLastErrorTest\\SetLastErrorTest.cmd #81121
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256_1/Vector256_1_ro/Vector256_1_ro.cmd #81118
    8.0.0
  • Linux-arm64 Mono LLVM FullAOT leg frequently times out #80805
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'cls != nullptr && !isInvalidHandle(cls)' #80006
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] support calling UnmanagedCallersOnly functions before managed main() #77957
    Future
  • [LSG] LoggerMessage - Add diagnostic when unexpected order provided in message template #52225
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: add RegexParseError.EmptyCharacterClass #81110
  • [LSRA][RyuJIT] Spill single-def vars at def, if def weight is lower than use(s) weight #7994
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeUsesFloatReg(targetType) || (emitTypeSize(targetType) == emitTypeSize(op1Type))' #80773
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 7 Regressions on 11/15/2022 10:02:59 PM #78820
  • Application crash - access violation in coreclr!SVR::gc_heap::mark_object_simple1 #81015
  • Xamarin.Android 支持 System.IO.Ports #80352
  • Check for Mono runtime #81076
  • Clarification required on WinHttpHandler connection lease #80163
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort 7 no longer throws TimeoutException but System.IO.IOException with message mentioning timeout #81035
  • [wasm][debugger] Connection logic for Firefox tests needs improvement #73651
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: CollectionsMarshal as extension method #81067
  • JIT: Assertion failed '!m_rootNode->OperIsLocal() && !m_rootNode->OperIsLocalAddr()' during 'Morph - Structs/AddrExp' #81018
    8.0.0
  • Improve FrozenDictionary/Set code coverage #80378
    8.0.0
  • Consider changing Enum's cache to store arrays of the underlying type #44365
    Future
  • [6.0] WASM CI failure: WorkloadManifestCompositionException: Workload manifest dependency 'Emscripten' version '6.0.4' is lower than version '6.0.13' required by manifest 'mono.toolchain' #80574
    6.0.x
  • Re-evaluate defaults in ArrayPool.Shared #12800
    Future
  • Investigate providing file-system based implementation of Microsoft.Win32.Registry #19824
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [IGNORE] testing lib tests with wasi #81137
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix use-after-free in EventPipe #81135
    EventPipe, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [Release/7.0] CoreCLR initialization failures logging #81134
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Ensure converter factories do not throw on unsupported types. #81133
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Enable Vector4.Dot #81130
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Change banana build to Release #81127
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix S.N.Vector4 related assert #81126
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Move mono llvm fullaot runtime test leg to rolling build #81125
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Encode calling convention in mangled function pointer representation #81122
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add missing OL releases to RID graph #81115
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Re-enable ApiCompat ref<->src assembly validation #81104
    area-Meta, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/7.0] Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #81101
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • [wasm] Fix type check for PackedSimd.Splat #81100
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • BrowserDebugProxy: unify debug metadata reading for PE and Webcil #81099
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use IndexOf in StringBuilder.Replace(string, string, ...) #81098
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • avoid allocation of SelectClientCertificate delegate #81096
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Avoid creating stores to dead fields in block morphing #81095
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #81092
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Add missing case for upper save/restore #81091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Always allocate when computing temp path #81085
    arch-wasm, area-System.IO, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix tailcall-to-loop improper locals zeroing #81083
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Introduce AOT friendly version of ToLogFont and FromLogFont #81082
    area-System.Drawing, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] Fix analyzer support in templates #81077
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Fix build issues #81074
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable same set of analyzers for C# tools as for the rest of repo #81073
    area-Meta
  • [wasm] Improve jiterpreter jit calls #81071
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix TarWriter.TarEntry exception when adding file whose Unix group owner does not exist in the system #81070
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Simplify getting full names for type loader purposes #81069
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid GetConstructors in constraint validation #81068
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove defensive Task[] copy from non-generic Task.WhenAll #81065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix multiple dumps from being generated #81064
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Add new proposed API to Ancillary.Interop #81063
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices

Merged

  • JIT: build pred lists before inlining #81000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable eventsourceerror test #81094
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] improve default initial memory size #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] ManagedToNativeGenerator: Skip unmanaged dlls #81066
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix a few static linking issues #81086
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Android] Bump target SDK version in Android manifest #80923
    os-android, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Bump Microsoft.Windows.Compatibility version from 2 to 3 #81062
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • Minor cleanup in frozen collection code #81080
    area-System.Collections
  • [JIT] Fixed assertion for targetType and op1 type not being the same #81060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix publishing to Arcade when there are no merged tests in the set #81054
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimize "new DateTime(<const args>)" via improvements in JIT VN #81005
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Add option to skip generating apk for a specific project #80909
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [iOS][Android] ActiveIssue SpanTests and Matrix4x4Tests that are failing on CI #80877
  • [mono][interp] Remove dependence on svar/dvar when computing call offset #81017
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Speed up frozen string dictionaries and sets by ~25-30% #81021
    area-System.Collections
  • JIT: Add Statement::m_treeListEnd #81031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add direct jit calls to jiterpreter #80968
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Uncover IlcGenerateMstatFile #80998
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [webcil] Minor cleanups #81009
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [NativeAOT] removed native RWLock #81058
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] benchmark fix aggressive trimming #81037
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #81006
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Fix Configuration Binding with Instantiated Objects #81050
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Initial support for zmm in .NET #80960
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • WIP: [wasm] Wasi build improvements #81052
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [release/7.0] Target lower glibc for Linux arm64 #80866
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Merge-on-Red] - Implement XML log fixer for Helix #80751
  • Add Utf8JsonWriter.WriteRawValue(System.Buffers.ReadOnlySequence). #76444
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Improve XmlSerializationWriter.WriteTypedPrimitive #76436
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • [WIP] Cloning files on OSX-like platforms when possible instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup intrinsinsics + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • WIP: Proof of concept port of interleave feature #78374
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Avoid allocations when adding existing items to the blob heap. #81059
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • Add additional case where public signing cannot be used #77998
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Implementation of Lemire's nearly divisionless method #79790
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0][browser] improve default initial memory size #80849
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.x
  • Create skeleton for the ComInterfaceGenerator #80887
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Update the JIT to track `Span.Length` and `ReadOnlySpan.Length` as "never negative" #81055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Quic, 6.0.15
  • [release/6.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80872
    Servicing-approved, Servicing-consider, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 6.0.15
  • [release/7.0] Correctly handle HFA structs when crossgen'd on Arm64 #80881
    Servicing-approved, area-crossgen2-coreclr, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [mono][loader] Set status on success #80951
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.4
  • [release/7.0] [mono][aot] Disable dedup for wrapper with a return type which has a … #81003
    Servicing-approved, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 7.0.4
  • [release/6.0] Don't pass --minimize to Xcode 13.3 dsymutil #81042
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.15
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Introduce insGroup/instrDesc backwards navigation #80840
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Continuation] - Enable the fundamentals behind libraries tests compiled via Crossgen2 #80946
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] [Mono] Fix function pointer check #80927
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Add SYSLIB* analyzers to global configs #80930
    area-Meta
  • Fix generic parameter data flow validation in NativeAOT #80956
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Use RunContinuationsAsynchronously for block completion tasks #81013
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Improve Http2Connection buffer management #79484
    area-System.Net.Http, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Harden and re-enable DualMode socket tests #80715
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Switch tailcall implicit byref optimization to use last use information #81033
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Promote Tier0 methods with loops to InstrumentedTier0 #81051
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][libs] Fix `WasmAppHost`, and `AppBundle` for library tests #77719
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Inline resource strings in the compiler #80896
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable CA1859 - Use concrete types when possible for improved performance #80848
  • Copy local intellisense xmls for assemblies with source of truth. #79134
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][aot] Emit native-to-managed wrappers for [UnmanagedCallersOnly… #80918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Handle Assert failure when GetDelegateForFunctionPointer is invoked with VoidDelegate type #79530
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Propagate cancellation tokens to TrySetCanceled in Dataflow #80978
    area-System.Threading.Tasks
  • Ensure only one empty string exists in the UserString heap. #80273
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.LdapConnection has wrong argument check (#78459) #80636
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
